s.text: The anti-tobacco bill is dead because Big Tobacco bought the Republican senators, charges Margaret Carlson (CNN's Capital Gang ). True enough, agrees Al Hunt, but let's not forget that the trial lawyers bought the Democrats.
Big Tobacco didn't kill the bill, argues Gigot, the bill killed itself.
